positive degree: few;;Use 'few' with countable nouns and 'little' with uncountable nouns
little;;Use 'little' with uncountable nouns and 'few' with countable nouns
comparative degree: fewer;;Use 'fewer' with countable nouns and 'less' with uncountable nouns
less;;Use 'less' with uncountable nouns and 'fewer' with countable nouns
superlative degree: fewest;;Use 'fewest' with countable nouns and 'least' with uncountable nouns
least;;Use 'least' with uncountable nouns and 'fewest' with countable nouns
